评论详情: Looks great and fits great.
I ordered one (XL)  (47 inch chest), just one to make sure it was what it claimed to be...indeed! I am ordering 2 more!

First off, only 4 stars bc of the fake pocket. The buttons are nice, there's a waist adjustment strap in the back, goes well with black or white or red. Can be dressed up formal for parties or with a ruffled shirt for that vampire vibe. My boyfriend looks great in this, wore it to the theater and got a bunch of compliments.

Have had this vest/waistcoat for awhile and with a wide variety of uses it has held up very well! All of the custom / great looking buttons are still there (could use the traditional, back up button inside the vest). The material, sewing and design has held up and works great. I DO like (others complained otherwise) that the length is longer, making it a traditional waistcoat! This would work great for guys with a larger "tummy" that don't want their dress shirt hanging below a traditional vest!!! HIGHLY Recommend. One of my favorite Amazon Purchases!
